message.raw: Fixed bugs in novatech and pulseblaster buffered mode. The novatech should now work in buffered mode, and smart programming appears to be working fine, though I don't think I've tested all the possible permutations of how a new run can differ from an old run. Bugs may appear in time, but we'll catch them when they do!
